product_name: AlpineAire Foods Beef and Rice Burrito Bowl - 2 Servings
long_description: Enjoy a hearty burrito bowl of cilantro-lime rice, seasoned beef, black beans, corn, red and green bell peppers and zesty Mexican spices when you've worked up a big appetite in the backcountry.
short_description: Enjoy a hearty burrito bowl of cilantro-lime rice, seasoned beef, black beans, corn, red and green bell peppers and zesty Mexican spices when you've worked up a big appetite in the backcountry.
